external_games.name: Snoopy DS: Let's Go Meet Snoopy and His Friends!

name: Snoopy DS: Let's Go Meet Snoopy and His Friends!
summary: Snoopy DS: Let's Go Meet Snoopy and His Friends is a game developed by Square Enix for the Nintendo DS. It consists of several minigames covering a variety of gameplay types, linked together by a world in which the player can talk to Peanuts characters and perform simple quests for them.
